sources.title: Alice the Peacemaker (1924)
sources.description: Alice tries to make two rival newsboys friends by telling them a story of a cat and a mouse whose constant battlings lead to being hunted by the police, when they learned to cooperate. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/alice-the-peacemaker-1924/

metadata.Plot: Alice tries to make two rival newsboys friends by telling them a story of a cat and a mouse whose constant battlings lead to being hunted by the police, when they learned to cooperate.
metadata.Actors: Virginia Davis, Tommy Hicks, Leon Holmes
